Articles.Content:
so i want to say it may be an out of date mod but i keep crashing while loading the game itl usually get to a certain point of a mod and then crash then il delete whatever mod that was there but it just keeps happening trying not to do a fresh install cause im on terrible internet currently but ig i will if i have to cause i have a good amount and i dont have a clue what im looking for in these crash dumbs and such :P.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/b9pkzebvz5u0z80/output_log.txt?dl=0                 output_log.txt

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gubot52u09thv55/error.log?dl=0                           error.log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/7bccrgxytlt0i1l/crash.dmp?dl=0                            crash.dmp
i figured it out it was outdated mods like i thought but one is definitely up to date that was causing an issue but idk il just go to that mods forum and see whats up.

I'm not sure exactly what is causing your crash however I do notice that you have two versions of ModuleManager, you should only keep the newest one 2.8.1.  Other than that make sure all of your mods are up to date.  Now a couple of questions for you, are you running the 64 bit version of KSP and how much RAM does your system have?  I only ask because your mod list is moderately large and if you don't have enough RAM and don't run 64 bit KSP you are going to experience crashes even if all your mods are up to date.
